class.name: anywheresoftware.b4j.objects.Shell
class.comment: Shell provides methods to start new processes and run other applications. The execution is asynchronous. The ProcessCompleted event is raised after the process has exited.
class.event: ProcessCompleted (Success As Boolean, ExitCode As Int, StdOut As String, StdErr As String)
StdOut (Buffer() As Byte, Length As Int)
StdErr (Buffer() As Byte, Length As Int)

method.name: GetTempErr
method.comment: Returns the current error output. Should only be used when the process was started with Run (not RunWithOutputEvents).

method.name: RunSynchronous
method.comment: Starts the process and waits for it to complete.

method.name: Run
method.comment: Starts the process. TimeoutMs - Timeout in milliseconds. Pass -1 to disable the timeout.

method.name: RunWithOutputEvents
method.comment: Starts the process. The StdOut and StdErr events will be raised when new data is available. Note that these events are raised on a background thread.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. EventName - Determines the sub that will handle the events. Executable - Executable file to run. Args - List of command line arguments. Pass Null if not needed.

method.name: KillProcess
method.comment: Kills the process if it is currently running.

method.name: WriteToInputStream
method.comment: Writes data to the process input stream.

method.name: GetTempErr2
method.comment: Same as GetTempErr. DiscardReadData - If true then the buffer is emptied after this call.

method.name: SetEnvironmentVariables
method.comment: Set the system environment variables that will be passed to the child process. Example: shl.SetEnvironmentVariables(CreateMap("ZZZ": "abc", "YYYY": "213"))

method.name: GetTempOut
method.comment: Returns the current output. Should only be used when the process was started with Run (not RunWithOutputEvents).

method.name: GetTempOut2
method.comment: Same as GetTempOut. DiscardReadData - If true then the buffer is emptied after this call.

property.name: WorkingDirectory
property.comment: Gets or sets the process working directory.

property.name: InputStreamEnabled
property.comment: Gets or sets whether the process input stream will be open for communication. You can use WriteToInputStream to write data while the process is running.

property.name: Encoding
property.comment: Sets the encoding used. This encoding should match the process output encoding. The default value is UTF8.
